availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Hazel. Father of George W. Hazel, Zephaniah Hazel, Caleb F. Hazel, Hiram H. Hazel, Sarah E. Hazel, John R. Hazel, Fannie A. Hazel, Amanda M. Hazel, and Richard M. Hazel. Farmer in Union County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 2, p. 464B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 514.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 414B.
